summary: A small quest mod with a nice reward.
descriptionHtml:
Inquisitor Armor Pack v1

Yet another small preview of my upcoming Hammerfell mod, this mod adds several new armor pieces that are fully modular.

-The new Greave pieces
*Iron
*Steel
*Inquisitor

As well as a new Inquisitor Cuirass, Boots, Gloves, and Hood.

There should be no compatibility issues, and the armors have been thoroughly tested.

There are male and female versions but the female may be a bit buggy. Weight slider supported!

**Clipping issues have been noted, and may be resolved in a future update.**

Also included is an old school style quest to retrieve the new items. By old school I mean, no hints, no markers, no quest info in your journal. You must read the clues, and deduce where to go. If you're absolutely stuck, or super lazy, you can find the locations in the ReadMe file (click the gear icon above).

The quest can be started by finding the note on the bar in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

Installation-

Download with manager!

or

Download manually
Extract the the contents of the file to your data folder.

All work done in Nifskope, GIMP, and CK.

And of course, please check out our Dev Diary series for more info on Hammerfell.
author: CalledFireX
